title: Emerald Radiance Chandbali Jhumka - Manoharam Kundan Vibha
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features faceted Emerald cabochons of fine quality
and lustrous golden-hued pearls. The intricate framework is crafted with meticulous detail.
features: Classic Chandbali design with a modern twist. The emerald teardrop is surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ stones, atop a filigree framework adorned with more CZs. Delicate golden pearl drops (gundu pusalu) add movement and elegance. The detailed setting style and the Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant emerald green accent
complemented by the clear sparkle of the CZ stones and the soft golden hue of the pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for contemporary events and celebrations
blending traditional charm with modern style.
description: These Chandbali Jhumkas offer a unique blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The high-quality emeralds, sparkling CZs, and the rich gold finish create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. Handcrafted with precision by skilled artisans, these earrings are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, representing timeless elegance and cultural heritage.
